title: 2 storied house at land value
details:
The perfect location for your residence. Situated in a highly residential area with ample convinience at your door step.

This land consist of 10 perches with an old house which could be used with major modifications. Suitable location for you to enjoy natures essence also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Baseline road and Cambel place. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and all your needs within close range.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
